infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.description: Passive: Infiltrators jump to the back of enemy territory at the start of combat.

blaster.name: Blaster
blaster.description: Every fourth Blaster attack fires additonal attacks which deal double damage.

bonuses.effect: Mercenaries can be paid gold to upgrade their ability
Demolitionist spells stun targets they hit for 2.5 seconds
Ally Star Guardian basic attacks are converted to true damage. All other ally basic attacks are converted to magic damage

protector.name: Protector
protector.description: Protectors gain a shield scaling off max health for 3 seconds whenever they cast.

mystic.name: Mystic
mystic.description: Grants the team bonus Magic Resist.

sorcerer.name: Sorcerer
sorcerer.description: All allies gain increased Spell Power.

bonuses.effect: Mana-Reaver attacks increase the mana cost of their target’s next spell by 40%

blademaster.name: Blademaster
blademaster.description: Blademasters have a chance on hit to attack two extra times.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: Snipers deal increased damage for each hex of distance between themselves and their target.

bonuses.effect: Starships continuously circle the arena and cannot basic attack and gains 40 mana per second
